name: Be King
description:
Be king is a decision taking game, and you can loose if you take the wrong decisions!
Taking and making the right decisions is what you need to ensure you keep increasing your empire in size, and in power!

Features


  • Colorfull
  • 20 decisions that repeats over and over again!
  • Choices-Matter
  • Strategical Management
  • Cozy and relaxing.
  • Being a king could be fun, who knows?
